name: promise-runner
description: Run interdependent functions that return promises in order based on their dependencies

scripts.pre-commit: npm run build && npm run test:light && npm run document
scripts.post-commit: npm run build:commit && npm run document:commit
scripts.travis:script: npm run test && npm run coveralls
scripts.test: lint-coffee src && npm run document:check && nsp check && test-server-module -c
scripts.build:commit: git add lib/ && git commit lib/ -n -m "chore: update build" || echo "No changes committed"
scripts.document:commit: git add doc/ && git commit doc/ -n -m "docs: update documentation" || echo "No changes committed"
scripts.semantic-release: semantic-release pre && npm publish && semantic-release post
